title: If I die from lung cancer...
body:
... it will be because I've inhaled unhealthy amounts of the following substances over the last 25 years of my life:

1. Black mold
2. Sawdust
3. Oven cleaner fumes
4. Helium
5. Cigarette smoke
6. Wood screws
7. Chinese wood cockroaches
8. Calvin Klein's Escape for men
9. That sugary dust that collects at the bottom of cereal bags
10. Dr. Pepper

Needless to say, my throat hurts all the time and I have lymph nodes the size of hackey sacks.

I'm watching Bogey chase squirrels across our backyard. The expression on his face is much like mine if I were to see a couple well-done steaks scurrying through the branches. Why are there steaks up in that tree? I don't know, but if one of them drops... I'm eating it!

Isn't it sad that there's all kinds of work going on at the theater right now, and this is the kind of post I write? Sometimes you feel like a nut. Sometimes you don't.

I'm off to go cuddle with the projector.
author: Dan

comments.author: whitty
comments.body:
I can testify that when I drove by the theater earlier today there was a man with lots of stuff in the back of his truck came out and got his lunch box. Indeed there is so much work being done it requires a lunch break!

And there is a single shoe in the parking lot behind the theater.

I hope you start feeling better. I had giant nodes once. It sucked.

comments.author: One Legged Man
comments.body: I was wondering where that thing went.

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
i miss playing hackey sack
i miss smoking cigarettes
i think ill go eat some of that sugary dust you spoke of .. to fill my need for the other two

comments.author: One Legged Man
comments.body: I miss playing hackey sack as well.

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body: You should play Hackey Sack with the projector! You could rename the game "Break my ankle Sack"

comments.author: And Dr. Dre
comments.body: ...nothing you idiot! Dr. Dre's dead, he's locked in my basement.

comments.author: Nicki J
comments.body:
Go Team Moxie! (ala the venture brothers)

Ok.. so maybe I'm just a dork. I'm prolly the only Venture Brothers lover on here...

I'll shut up now.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body:
I believe it's Estee Lauder Pleasures you breathe in. And don't forget dog hair.

But don't worry blog readers - if Dan were to die suddenly, he's instructed me write a post to inform everyone. Quite the fatalist.

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
what nicki?!?! i love the veture brothers and you know that. but i bet i just dont count. or something. geeeeee.

missourians drink way too much dr. pepper.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
"My name is Caleb and I'm a Pepperholic."

[Audience response]

"I am getting help these days. My therapist introduced me to caffeine-free Dr. Pepper. I figured there was no way it could be as good. But now I have found myself liking it better than the original. And my headaches have decreased tremendously! Of course from time to time I will drink a caffeinated beverage, but my therapist does not know this. So for the love of the Pepper, don't tell her."

[Sighs from a very bored audience]

comments.author: nicholas
comments.body:
I have giant nodes right now. That's right. Giant. Nodes. Heh heh. That's right. Giant.

I said GIANT.

comments.author: Yoda
comments.body:
For First Friday, excited I am.

To First Friday's on Coruscant, compare it will not, but intrigued nonetheless I am.

When open, will you be?

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body: So if he dies, we will get a post to tell us.  But what about the cinema?  What happens then?  Dan, have you adequately prepared for your possible demise?
